thread.title: Future Claps Back At Rocko, "U Gon Die Fake"
thread.title_full: Future Claps Back At Rocko, "U Gon Die Fake"

author: Shaun M
title: Future Claps Back At Rocko, "U Gon Die Fake"
text:
Home > Music > Future Claps Back At Rocko, "U Gon Die Fake" Future Claps Back At Rocko, "U Gon Die Fake" 2 2 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 22, 2017 at 05:21pm Future took no time to respond to Rocko's "be a man" post. 
Following Rocko 's Instagram declaration that he's always been supportive of him, Future posted some comments to set the record straight. If the Atlanta artist was being tactful so far, all that went out the window in a jif. 
"All I want is my percentage we agreed upon, nothing more nothing less," Rocko said in the previous post highlighting that he always posts Future's music on his IG page. 
"U post it cause I'm the shit nigga... on gang tho! U gon die fake nigga," Future clapped back in Rocko's comment section. "U embraced me as a brother at my worst & try to play me! Ain talk to u in years nigga! Ain't no nigga on earth gone take shit with consequences, judge or no judge nigga! U a con artist." 
Hendrix's response prompted Rocko to disable the comment section. He stated that he will pursue legal avenues to force Future to honor a previous contract. Rocko signed the "Mask Off" emcee to A1 Records years ago. Reports suggest he seeks royalties from his former protege's brand new 2017 albums. Future's latest effort, HNDRXX , drops Friday. 
Check out The Shade Room's screenshot of Hendrix's comment. A post shared by The Shade Room (@theshaderoom) on Feb 22, 2017 at 1:07pm PST Feb 22, 2017 at 05:21pm 2 Views
